path: /news/Public defence of Mehdi Ghanimifard's doctoral thesis/

markdownRemark.html:
Cordially welcome to the public defence of Mehdi Ghanimifard's doctoral thesis that he will defend on Wednesday 27 May, at 15.15 online via Zoom. The title is Why the pond is not outside the frog? Grounding in contextual representations by neural language models. The proceedings can also be followed via link in room J335 at Humanisten.

Doctoral candidate: Mehdi Ghanimifard, University of Gothenburg

Supervisor: Simon Dobnik, University of Gothenburg Assistant supervisor: Staffan Larsson, University of Gothenburg

Opponent: Parisa Kordjamshidi, Michigan State University

Committee: Raffaella Bernardi, University of Trento David Schlangen, University of Potsdam Devdatt Dubashi, Chalmers University of Technology Joakim Nivre, Uppsala University (replacement)

Chair: Lena Eriksson, University of Gothenburg

Zoom webinar: Follow the proceedings here

Date: 2020-05-27 Time: 15:15 The proceedings can also be followed via link in room J335, Humanisten Title: Why the pond is not outside the frog? Grounding in contextual representations by neural language models

Full text: http://hdl.handle.net/2077/64095
